headline: EPAM Systems Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: EPAM Systems has struggled to keep pace with the broader market over the past year, though analysts maintain a moderately positive outlook on its growth prospects.

headline: TD Cowen Upgrade and Delivery Restructuring Could Be a Game Changer for EPAM Systems (EPAM)
summary: On August 18, 2025, TD Cowen upgraded EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) to ‘Buy’ from ‘Hold’ after the company delivered three consecutive quarters of organic revenue acceleration and completed its post-Ukraine delivery restructuring. This upgrade highlights EPAM’s ability to outpace many large IT peers in revenue growth while emphasizing the firm’s renewed focus on sales execution, client expansion, and margin improvement. We'll explore how TD Cowen's recognition of EPAM's successful delivery...

headline: Baird Mid Cap Growth Equity Q2 2025 Commentary
